description: This course introduces the craft of creative writing through contemporary readings and writing exercises in poetry and prose. Students learn to read and to write literature with attention to how a literary work is made. Emphasis on the elements of craft and revision provide preparation for students who want to continue into creative writing workshops at the 200- and 300-levels. Offered annually.
name: Craft of Creative Writing
notes: This course has class-year limits and is open only to sophomore and first-year
title: The Craft of Creative Writing
